title: Video Asset
description: Represents a published media artifact (e.g., a video, podcast, or theater piece) that is based on a specific script.

videoId.description: A unique identifier for the video asset.

title.description: The title of the published video.

description.description: A brief description of the video content.

url.description: The URL or path to the published media file.

thumbnailUrl.description: The URL for a thumbnail or cover image of the media.

durationInSeconds.description: The total duration of the media in seconds.

storyId.description: A foreign key linking to the parent story.

scriptId.description: A foreign key linking to the specific script this video is based on.

publicationInfo.description: Information regarding the publication state of the video.

publishedAt.description: The timestamp when the video was first published.

lastEditedAt.description: The timestamp of the last edit to the published video.
